3312.verse: وَمَآ|And whatever|112|122|46$أُوتِيتُم|you have been given|158|179|3007$مِّن|from|50|71|53$شَىْءٍ|things,|69|90|186$فَمَتَـٰعُ|(is) an enjoyment|137|158|13495$ٱلْحَيَوٲةِ|(of the) life|96|106|817$ٱلدُّنْيَا|(of) the world|112|129|818$وَزِينَتُهَا‌ۚ|and its adornment.|145|178|13496$وَمَا|And what|83|116|46$عِندَ|(is) with|75|108|521$ٱللَّهِ|Allah,|56|89|606$خَيْرٌ|(is) better|88|105|520$وَأَبْقَىٰٓ‌ۚ|and more lasting.|134|210|11521$أَفَلَا|So (will) not|101|252|452$تَعْقِلُونَ|you use intellect?|137|213|453$

3313.verse: أَفَمَن|Then is (he) whom|144|153|7906$وَعَدْنَـٰهُ|We have promised him|168|185|13497$وَعْدًا|a promise|83|100|7921$حَسَنًا|good,|69|86|2160$فَهُوَ|and he|65|82|1591$لَـٰقِيهِ|(will) meet it,|109|118|13498$كَمَن|like (the one) whom|152|162|3461$مَّتَّعْنَـٰهُ|We provided him|129|148|13499$مَتَـٰعَ|enjoyment|89|108|8088$ٱلْحَيَوٲةِ|(of the) life|96|115|817$ٱلدُّنْيَا|(of) the world|112|131|818$ثُمَّ|then|50|60|293$هُوَ|he|48|61|298$يَوْمَ|(on the) Day|105|132|1057$ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ|(of) the Resurrection|159|186|820$مِنَ|(will be) among|121|148|156$ٱلْمُحْضَرِينَ|those presented?|135|148|13500$

3314.verse: وَيَوْمَ|And (the) Day|114|127|819$يُنَادِيهِمْ|He will call them|127|153|13501$فَيَقُولُ|and say,|77|103|5331$أَيْنَ|"Where,|72|98|5492$شُرَكَآءِىَ|(are) My partners|137|163|9940$ٱلَّذِينَ|whom|70|83|20$كُنتُمْ|you used (to)|111|340|214$تَزْعُمُونَ|claim?"|105|334|5494$

3315.verse: قَالَ|(Will) say|82|89|309$ٱلَّذِينَ|those -|70|84|20$حَقَّ|(has) come true|127|140|1122$عَلَيْهِمُ|against whom|111|124|602$ٱلْقَوْلُ|the Word,|86|100|8490$رَبَّنَا|"Our Lord!|86|100|1167$هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ|These|82|89|335$ٱلَّذِينَ|(are) those whom|138|156|20$أَغْوَيْنَآ|we led astray.|115|150|13502$أَغْوَيْنَـٰهُمْ|We led them astray|150|185|13503$كَمَا|as|53|88|110$غَوَيْنَا‌ۖ|we were astray.|128|146|13504$تَبَرَّأْنَآ|We declare our innocence|192|203|13505$إِلَيْكَ‌ۖ|before You.|97|119|45$مَا|Not|43|65|262$كَانُوٓاْ|they used (to)|117|139|94$إِيَّانَا يَعْبُدُونَ|worship us."|137|148|13506$

3316.verse: وَقِيلَ|And it will be said,|141|159|3478$ٱدْعُواْ|"Call|76|112|6460$شُرَكَآءَكُمْ|your partners."|119|155|7092$فَدَعَوْهُمْ|And they will call them,|175|211|10847$فَلَمْ|but not|69|87|4026$يَسْتَجِيبُواْ|they will respond|132|142|8404$لَهُمْ|to them|72|93|98$وَرَأَوُاْ|and they will see|132|153|1450$ٱلْعَذَابَ‌ۚ|the punishment.|127|148|1442$لَوْ|If only|62|83|905$أَنَّهُمْ|[that] they|95|106|461$كَانُواْ|had been|81|334|94$يَهْتَدُونَ|guided!|88|341|4371$

3317.verse: وَيَوْمَ|And (the) Day|114|142|819$يُنَادِيهِمْ|He will call them|127|184|13501$فَيَقُولُ|and say,|77|134|5331$مَاذَآ|"What|60|117|271$أَجَبْتُمُ|did you answer|120|148|13507$ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ|the Messengers?"|136|136|2247$

3318.verse: فَعَمِيَتْ|But (will) be obscure|157|185|13508$عَلَيْهِمُ|to them|73|129|602$ٱلْأَنۢبَآءُ|the information|120|176|13509$يَوْمَئِذٍ|that day,|82|138|3485$فَهُمْ|so they|70|98|152$لَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ|will not ask one another.|184|184|13510$

3319.verse: فَأَمَّا|But as for|85|102|265$مَن|(him) who|86|120|76$تَابَ|repented|79|113|4956$وَءَامَنَ|and believed,|108|142|11243$وَعَمِلَ|and did|80|114|621$صَـٰلِحًا|righteousness,|116|133|622$فَعَسَىٰٓ|then perhaps|107|134|3836$أَن|[that]|60|115|655$يَكُونَ|he will be|82|137|1335$مِنَ|of|50|105|156$ٱلْمُفْلِحِينَ|the successful ones.|157|184|13511$

3320.verse: وَرَبُّكَ|And your Lord|112|120|4866$يَخْلُقُ|creates|71|86|2875$مَا|what|53|68|262$يَشَآءُ|He wills|69|84|867$وَيَخْتَارُ‌ۗ|and chooses.|108|123|13512$مَا|Not|43|58|262$كَانَ|they have|87|102|913$لَهُمُ|for them|76|84|1027$ٱلْخِيَرَةُ‌ۚ|the choice.|95|126|13513$سُبْحَـٰنَ|Glory be|86|148|10207$ٱللَّهِ|(to) Allah|82|144|606$وَتَعَـٰلَىٰ|and High is He|114|176|5903$عَمَّا|above what|98|129|724$يُشْرِكُونَ|they associate (with Him).|196|196|7075$

3312.verse: And whatever thing you [people] have been given - it is [only for] the enjoyment of worldly life and its adornment. And what is with Allah is better and more lasting; so will you not use reason?

3313.verse: Then is he whom We have promised a good promise which he will obtain like he for whom We provided enjoyment of worldly life [but] then he is, on the Day of Resurrection, among those presented [for punishment in Hell]?

3314.verse: And [warn of] the Day He will call them and say, "Where are My 'partners' which you used to claim?"

3315.verse: Those upon whom the word will have come into effect will say, "Our Lord, these are the ones we led to error. We led them to error just as we were in error. We declare our disassociation [from them] to You. They did not used to worship us."

3316.verse: And it will be said, "Invoke your 'partners' " and they will invoke them; but they will not respond to them, and they will see the punishment. If only they had followed guidance!

3317.verse: And [mention] the Day He will call them and say, "What did you answer the messengers?"

3318.verse: But the information will be unapparent to them that Day, so they will not [be able to] ask one another.

3319.verse: But as for one who had repented, believed, and done righteousness, it is promised by Allah that he will be among the successful.

3320.verse: And your Lord creates what He wills and chooses; not for them was the choice. Exalted is Allah and high above what they associate with Him.

3321.verse: And your Lord knows what their breasts conceal and what they declare.

3322.verse: And He is Allah; there is no deity except Him. To Him is [due all] praise in the first [life] and the Hereafter. And His is the [final] decision, and to Him you will be returned.
